title: Tower
fullText:
The tower shall be designed and installed by a competent person in accordance with the requirements of AS/NZS 1170 series.
There are two types of tower in common use for wind generators: the self-supporting type and the guyed type. These have common requirements for sound and safe installation practice. The installation, raising and lowering of the tower (and fitting of the wind generator, where this is done after standing the tower) shall be supervised by a competent person.
